name: Dragon's Call 2: Revival of the Giant Dragons
name_original: Dragon's Call 2: Revival of the Giant Dragons
description:
Dragon's Call 2: Revival of the Giant Dragons is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by NetDragon. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Ray Media Group. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Dragon's Call 2: Revival of the Giant Dragons is available on PC.
